# Reading a SAS file

```{r}
library(haven)
french <- read_sas("data/French_males.sas7bdat")
```

Inspect the data:

```{r}
head(french)
dim(french)
names(french)
```

# Describe the variables


## Numerically

```{r}
summary(french$Age)
summary(french$logDR)
```

## Visually

```{r}
hist(french$logDR)
plot(french$Age, french$logDR)

```

# Fit a simple linear regression

```{r}
myfit <- lm( logDR ~ Age, data = french)
summary(myfit)
myfit
```


## Plotting a fitted line over a scatterplot

```{r}
plot(mydata$Age, mydata$logDR)
abline(myfit, col = "red")
```
